River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, well suited to the lush tragedies of love and war being played out. But after attempting to tell the love stories of three different lovers and following many generations to the present day there was more than a little confusion. Most of the film is very well performed but there were too many characters thrown around to distinguish and cared

This film is the first of three starring the same character played by Dudikoff.
